meanings.definition: A device used to spray paint or ink onto a surface.
meanings.sent1: The artist used an airbrush to paint a beautiful mural on the wall.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new airbrush for my art projects.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the airbrush, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like an airbrush, delicately adding color to the story.
meanings.sent5: The airbrush hummed softly as it sprayed paint onto the canvas.

meanings.definition: To alter or enhance a photograph or image using an airbrush.
meanings.sent1: She carefully airbrushes the model's skin to remove imperfections in the photo.
meanings.sent2: He airbrushes the picture to make it look more vibrant.
meanings.sent3: The magician claimed he could airbrush people out of photographs with a wave of his hand.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to airbrush away the wrinkles on her face.
meanings.sent5: The artist skillfully airbrushed shadows into the portrait, adding depth.

meanings.definition: The act of using an airbrush to apply paint or ink.
meanings.sent1: His airbrushing of the car gave it a sleek, professional finish.
meanings.sent2: The class learned the art of airbrushing in their painting workshop.
meanings.sent3: The airbrushing of the graffiti on the wall made it look like a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her airbrushing technique was so precise that the colors blended seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The gentle hiss of the airbrushing machine filled the room as the artist worked.
